review.comment: Great experience! Will surely visit again soon and recommend this place.

review.comment: From the ambiance to the diverse menu offerings, each visit unveils a new reason to fall in love with this restaurant

reviewReply.comment: We are glad that you had a good time :)

review.name: accounts/1234567890/locations/543210987/reviews/333
review.comment: The attention to detail in both presentation and taste left me longing for another visit. However, the vegetables were a bit undercooked.

review.name: accounts/1234567890/locations/543210987/reviews/444
review.comment: Absolutely poor customer service. Had the worst 2 hours of my life waiting for my order only to realise the chef walked out.

reviewReply.comment: We are very sorry to hear this! Please get in touch with us at support@rest.in
